task.title: Transforming a DITA map into a WebHelp output
task.shortdesc: oXygen XML has many attractive transformation scenarios. When you are in a DITA map file (as opposed to a topic file), these are located on the bottom right side of the screen. In this tutorial, we will choose the WebHelp Classic output.

step.cmd: Go to the Transformation Scenarios dialog box.
Click on the DITA Map Webhelp Classic option.
The blue bar at the bottom of the screen will read Transformation in progress..
step.stepresult: In just a few moments, your new WebHelp will open in your browser.
